description: Wada's Memory Magnolia is an excellent choice for gardeners looking for a beautiful, low-maintenance flowering tree. The small rounded tree has an attractive spreading crown and grows to a height of 6-8 feet. It is covered in large fragrant white flowers that open briefly in spring, and its vibrant dark green foliage provides year-round colour. Perfect for small gardens, this magnolia cultivar is ideal for creating a show-stopping focal point. The flowers are also known to last longer than other varieties, making Wada's Memory Magnolia a unique and beautiful option for any gardener.
